# Department of Planning and Development

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.

703-324-1380 TTY 711

Email Us

12055 Government Center Parkway  
Fairfax, VA 22035

Tracy Strunk  
Director

# Virginia Form for Home Day Care

Use this application to submit the Contact with Local Zoning Administrator form when applying for a Virginia state license for a home day care. 

## HOW TO SUBMIT AN APPLICATION

All applications must be submitted electronically through the PLUS application portal.

For additional information on how to use the PLUS application portal, please visit the DPD PLUS Information & Support page. Instructional videos are available on the Fairfax County PLUS - YouTube channel.

If you have technical questions (e.g. account setup, password issues) regarding the PLUS system, please contact the Help Desk:

  * Hours of Operation: Mon. - Fri., 8 a.m. - 4 p.m.
  * PLUSSupport@FairfaxCounty.gov | 703-324-2222, TTY 711



Launch PLUS

## Additional Information

  * There is no application fee. 
  * An application may take approximately 14 calendar days to process if no additional information is requested or required. 



## Required Documents

An application will require the following documents:

**Contact with Local Zoning Administrator Form:** Complete the applicant portion of the form entitled CONTACT WITH LOCAL ZONING ADMINISTRATOR. This document is required

## Contact Us

For additional assistance, please contact the Ordinance Administration by phone at 703-324-1314 or by email.
